page.title: 11FARMING continued
page.content:
{TYPE OF FARMING AND FARMLAND contd. Much ground has been levelled and hedges removed to allow easier ploughing, and electric fences are often used to prevent livestock from straying.
{FARM MANAGEMENT There is a lot of planning and office work to do in modern, efficient farming. Mr. Stopps, a local farmer, believes that the entry into the Common Market was a dramatic change for the better. Wall maps show the types of crop in every field of his 1900 acres, worked by his staff of ten, his three sons and a farm manager, with the help of lots of different farm machinery. Milking is a very complicated business with a lot of expensive dairy cattle and milking machinery.
